nfref Struct Reference

#include <nfref.h>


Data Fields

enum notes_protocols protocol
char * user
char * system
unsigned short port
char * owner
char * name
char * pretty_name

Detailed Description

A reference to a notesfile. Specifically, all the information needed to specify a particular notesfile.

Field Documentation

enum notes_protocols nfref::protocol

The protocol to use to connect.

char* nfref::user

The username to connect as.

char* nfref::system

The system to connect to.

unsigned short nfref::port

The port to connect to.

char* nfref::owner

The owner of the notesfile, as in personal notesfiles.

char* nfref::name

The name of the notesfile.

char* nfref::pretty_name

The name of the notesfile, formatted according to the standards for user input of nfref syntax.
